comments:
When trying to add a new connection of type SRM I am getting "unknown protocol: httpg"
(full exception below).

A related issue: after the above error the connection does not appear in the grid-project browser; however, if i try to add a new connection using again the same name, it rejects this with: "Connection with given name already exists with this scope". This means that the plugin does not completely clean up the failed connection attempt.
